scripts.start:manager: yarn workspace linode-js-sdk build && lerna run start --stream --scope linode-manager -- --color
scripts.start:docker: yarn workspace linode-js-sdk build && yarn start:all
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/linode-js-sdk/node_modules && rm -rf packages/manager/node_modules && lerna clean --yes
scripts.docker:test: docker build -f Dockerfile . -t 'manager' && docker run -it cloud --rm -v $(pwd)/packages/manager/src:/home/node/app/packages/manager/src -v $(pwd)/packages/linode-js-sdk/src:/home/node/app/packages/linode-js-sdk/src manager test
scripts.docker:local: docker build -f Dockerfile . -t 'manager' -t 'dev' && docker run -it --rm -p 3000:3000 -v $(pwd)/packages/manager/src:/home/node/app/packages/manager/src -v $(pwd)/packages/linode-js-sdk/src:/home/node/app/packages/linode-js-sdk/src manager start:docker
scripts.docker:storybook: docker build -f Dockerfile . -t 'storybook' && docker run -it --rm -p 6006:6006 -v $(pwd)/packages/manager/src:/home/node/app/packages/manager/src -v $(pwd)/packages/linode-js-sdk/src:/home/node/app/packages/linode-js-sdk/src storybook storybook
